title: cultural_data_Victoria_Gallery_&_Museum
text:
﻿App Link on Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=uk.ac.liv.vgmibeacon.
Application Name: Victoria Gallery & Museum.
Number of Reviews: .
Application Description: Make the most of your visit to the Victoria Gallery & Museum, the iconic redbrick centrepiece of the University of Liverpool campus.Our brand-new app allows you to interact with many of the building’s features, revealing the rich history of the Victoria Building that was built in 1892.Using clever location-based technology, the app will suggest points of interest as you move around the building - although the app works just as well from home, allowing you to explore all 3 floors of the VG&M that are open to the public, as well as some behind-the-scenes gems that are usually off limits!App features:- Location-based recommended points of interest- Interactive building floor plans- History of the building including photographs, video & audio clips- Choose between a text based or audio guided tour of the buildingRead moreCollapse.
Number of Characters in Description: 837.00.
Overall Rate: 0.00.
First Page Reviews: Excellent app, gives a very informative view of the museum.  It is full of information and history of the area and more. Well worth downloading.
